CALL NEXT VALUE FOR JOBSTATS_SEQ
INSERT INTO JOBSTATS ( jobstats_id, job_id, sim_id, success, success_transfered_back, start_time, start_exec_time, finish_time, last_transfered_node)
VALUES ( #{jobstats_id}, #{job_id}, #{sim_id}, #{success}, #{successTransferBack}, #{startTime}, #{startExecutionTime}, #{finishTime}, #{lastTransferedNode})
